message.content: {"id": "17423", "title": "Revert appears twice in the popup menu", "description": "There are two instances of the Revert option in the menu.", "OB": "When opening the popup menu in a Java editor, I noticed that there are two instances of the Revert option.", "EB": "The Revert option should only appear once in the popup menu.", "SR": "To resolve this issue, please make sure that the Revert option only appears once in the popup menu, after the UNDO option and before the FORMAT option."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '17423', 'title': 'Bug 17423Revert apears twice in the popup menu.', 'description': 'There are two Revert option in the menu. ', 'OB': 'Bug 17423Revert apears twice in the popup menu. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Build F1.1) Open a java editor.2) Popup the menu. One after UNDO andother before FORMAT. '}
